Professional Summary

Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing innovative full-stack solutions for companies in the tech industry. Expert in Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, and modern development practices. Experienced in DevOps with Docker containerization and Portainer for container management. Proficient in database technologies including PostgreSQL and Supabase, with expertise in Tailwind CSS for responsive design. Skilled in creating complex systems like route mapping, data visualization, API integrations, and end-to-end testing. Passionate about contributing to impactful projects that challenge and inspire growth while mentoring development teams.
